name: Necro Zone
description:
An endless highscore shoot em up, protect mankind from mutated bones on the Moon.

In the future there’s no burial grounds left on earth. 

Corpses are sent to the Moon for their final resting. 

Smugglers dump radioactive wastes along the bones.

This causes unexpected mutations. 

The highest space threat to mankind... 

the Necro Zone. 

Controls

  • Move - WASD / Arrows
  • Fire - Space
  • Smart bomb - Shift
  • Don't fire to charge shot
Reference
Music Truth by Cyber-Rainforce
Moon satellite picture

Font: Title, Numbers,  Multiplier
